body:
That is not a second story.
It's a continuation. MC moves on with the other girl, but the uncle finds the videos of girl's past relationships, blackmails her and impregnates her.
Yes, MC is utterly clicked in the end.

So there's ntr here but both of them are wimps so the best friend of the male lead took the oppurtunity to take the girl after asking him if he can make a move since he won't and doesn't mind but at the end regrets it so he fucks a different girl to forget as he knows what's going on meanwhile female lead accepts the confession as she's tired of waiting for the male lead despite her advances. Not a bad NTR at all if you ask me. 2nd story on the other hand is bs, I bet that their child is not theirs and it's by the cucker then he impregnated her again.
So in the end that daughter and in the womb might not be his child either huh?
Seems pretty in brand for Ryo
That was the stupdest blackmail ever at the end and the author really didn't need to make it holy shit fuck him.
Yea this is new from the author that made the S.Y.G series so yea hope a translation for comes within the month
This was a wild one for real not sure this is a reupload tho hope it gets translated tho
